dcterms:creator: F. Liu
C. Masouros
A. P. Petropulu
H. Griffiths
L. Hanzo
dcterms:description: A dataset related to joint radar and communication design, focusing on applications, state-of-the-art techniques, and future directions in integrated sensing and communication systems.
dcterms:title: Integrated Sensing and Communication (ISAC) System

dcterms:creator: H. Hua
J. Xu
T. X. Han
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into optimal transmit beamforming strategies for integrated sensing and communication systems.
dcterms:title: Optimal Transmit Beamforming for ISAC

dcterms:creator: D. Xu
C. Liu
S. Song
D. W. K. Ng
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on robust and secure resource allocation strategies for ISAC systems, providing a novel optimization framework for variable-length snapshots.
dcterms:title: Robust and Secure Resource Allocation for ISAC Systems

dcterms:creator: D. Xu
C. Liu
S. Song
D. W. K. Ng
dcterms:description: This dataset explores integrated sensing and communication in coordinated cellular networks, focusing on the interaction between sensing and communication functionalities.
dcterms:title: Integrated Sensing and Communication in Coordinated Cellular Networks

dcterms:creator: Z. Liu
S. Aditya
H. Li
B. Clerckx
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a joint transmit and receive beamforming design approach in full-duplex integrated sensing and communications.
dcterms:title: Joint Transmit and Receive Beamforming Design in Full-Duplex ISAC

dcterms:creator: C. B. Barneto
et al.
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on beamformer design and optimization for joint communication and full-duplex sensing at millimeter waves.
dcterms:title: Beamformer Design and Optimization for Joint Communication and Full-Duplex Sensing

dcterms:creator: L. Xie
S. Song
Y. C. Eldar
K. B. Letaief
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses collaborative sensing in perceptive mobile networks, highlighting opportunities and challenges.
dcterms:title: Collaborative Sensing in Perceptive Mobile Networks

dcterms:creator: Z. Behdad
et al.
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses power allocation for joint communication and sensing in cell-free massive MIMO systems.
dcterms:title: Power Allocation for Joint Communication and Sensing in Cell-Free Massive MIMO

dcterms:creator: Y. Huang
Y. Fang
X. Li
J. Xu
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on coordinated power control for network integrated sensing and communication systems.
dcterms:title: Coordinated Power Control for Network Integrated Sensing and Communication

dcterms:creator: U. Demirhan
A. Alkhateeb
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses cell-free ISAC MIMO systems, focusing on joint sensing and communication beamforming.
dcterms:title: Cell-Free ISAC MIMO Systems
